qas.question: What year did the third season of American Idol first air?
Which contestant was best known for his bad audition of "She Bangs"?
Which contestant sold more albums than all except two from season three of American Idol?
Which contestant sang an off-key "She Bangs"?
Which contestant was number three in sales from season three?

context: Season three premiered on <a3_0>January 19, <a0_0>2004<a3_0/><a0_0/>. One of the most talked-about contestants during the audition process was <a1_0><a2_0><a4_0><a5_0>William Hung<a5_0/><a4_0/><a2_0/><a1_0/> whose off-key rendition of Ricky Martin's "She Bangs" received widespread attention. His exposure on Idol landed him a record deal and surprisingly he became the third best-selling singer from that season.
